articles.Title: Rosetta’s missing Philae lander is frantically doing improvised science, even as its batteries die
articles.Description: Less than two days after its historical landing, Rosetta's probe may be reaching its final hours. But with things so dire, the scientific team is racing to collect as much data as possible before Philae's batteries die.

articles.Description: Iowa’s newest Facebook friend is a $300 million data center that collects breaks on everything from property taxes to its purchases of electricity in a competition that shows the keen interest in landing big name tech properties.
